Html:
I am using PHPExcel 1.7.4 and I receive the following errors when writing this formula: $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->SetCellValue("B$row", "= SUMIF(Details!C:C,A$row,Details!J:J)" ); 

Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Summary!B3 -> Invalid
cell coordinate.' in C:\common\Classes\PHPExcel\Cell.php:272
Stack trace:
#0 C:\common\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007\Worksheet.php(969): PHPExcel_Cell
->getCalculatedValue()
#1 C:\common\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007\Worksheet.php(910): PHPExcel_Writ
er_Excel2007_Worksheet->_writeCell(Object(PHPExcel_Shared_XMLWriter), Object(PHP
Excel_Worksheet), 'B3', Array, Array)
#2 C:\common\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007\Worksheet.php(82): PHPExcel_Write
r_Excel2007_Worksheet->_writeSheetData(Object(PHPExcel_Shared_XMLWriter), Object
(PHPExcel_Worksheet), Array)
#3 C:\common\Classes\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007.php(260): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel20
07_Worksheet->writeWorksheet(Object(PHPExcel_Worksheet), Array)
#4 C:\Inetpub\wwwroot\apps\dataWhs\agedet.php(320): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007->s
ave('/common/log/age...')
#5 {main}
  thrown in C:\common\Classes\PHPExcel\Cell.php on line 272
There were some problems with formulae that referenced cells on other sheets in 1.7.4 that have since been resolved. Can you please try with the latest SVN code.

Thanks for replying Mark. I’m sorry but I’m not familiar with how get the latest SVN code. Does it require compiling?

From: MarkBaker [mailto:notifications@codeplex.com]
Sent: Monday, November 01, 2010 5:06 PM
To: Randy Weller
Subject: Re: SUMIF formula error [PHPExcel:232429]

From: MarkBaker

There were some problems with formulae that referenced cells on other sheets in 1.7.4 that have since been resolved. Can you please try with the latest SVN code.

Thanks. I’ll give it a try.
